xldoc.title: presumptions, claims and arguments
xldoc.description: An analysis of Quine's writings bearing on Carnap, analyticity and related matteres.
xldoc.keywords: philosophy logic history Carnap Quine analytic truth convention
xldoc.maintitle: Quine on Carnap and Analyticity - presumptions, claims and arguments

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: Apparent presumptions, explicit claims and reasoned arguments put forward by Quine against Carnap on the analytic/synthetic dichotomy and related problems.
